**Example 1: 修改绑定成员邮箱**



Input: 

```
tccli organization UpdateOrganizationMemberEmailBind --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --MemberUin 111111111111 \
    --BindId 12 \
    --Email 12***@qq.com \
    --CountryCode 86 \
    --Phone 18***32
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "b46d2afe-6893-4529-bc96-2c82d9214957"
    }
}
```
